fields.title: System Administrator
fields.desc: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on physical and virtual servers
fields.remarks: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on physical and virtual servers	Add/remove users and hardware, install  and configure software, OS updates, patches and hotfixes, perform backups

fields.title: Virtual Machine Administrator
fields.desc: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on virtual servers
fields.remarks: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on virtual servers	Add/remove users, install  and configure software, OS updates, patches and hotfixes, perform backups

fields.title: Database Administrator
fields.remarks:
Full control of RDBMS instance	
Add/remove users, CRUD operations, perform backups, administer database replication

fields.title: Developer
fields.remarks: Read only access to production application servers; SUDO permissions to deploy new software and restart applications	Responsible for creating code to support MAX applications. Deploying changes in compliance with MAX.gov Change Management Process.

fields.title: MAX Data Management Team
fields.desc: Restart Applications, Create users and manage permissions

fields.title: Internal User
fields.desc: General user with individual role based access using least privilege, vetted by the organization

fields.title: External User
fields.desc: User who has not been vetted by the organization

fields.title: All
fields.desc: Shorthand for a process that is a universal responsibility or applies to all users
